short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stijl is a dashboard showing all code reviews at multiple code review websites in a single page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Supported code review tools are:
- Gerrit (e.g. Android, Chrome OS)
- Rietveld (e.g. Chromium)

Source Code is hosted at https://github.com/google/stijl/.
